title: Typophile for illustrators?
content:
A bit off-topic : Does anyone if there's a similar forum or mailinglist like this for illustrators.   
Anything just 10% as good as Typophile would do.   
/peter
author: peterbruhn

comments.content:
You might try the Art Talk forums at   
 [http://www.theispot.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107221518/http:/www.theispot.com/)  
  
Joe VanDerBos   
 [www.joevanderbos.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107221518/http:/www.joevanderbos.com/)
